titles.title: For the relief of Patricia Macarelli, in her capacity as Administratrix of the estate of Edward Brian Halloran.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration Policy and Enforcement.

bill.summary: 10/11/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Patricia Macarelli, in her capacity as Administratrix of the estate of Edward Brian Halloran.
